traits.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the orog can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The orog makes two greataxe attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.
